name: Child Care Health Program (CCHP)
description: We're here to help child care providers and families in San Francisco neighborhoods with health, safety advice, checkups, training, and getting ready for emergencies. We provide vision screenings, dental screenings, hearing screenings, and nutrition screenings.
fullDescription: We're here to help child care providers and families in San Francisco neighborhoods with health, safety advice, checkups, training, and getting ready for emergencies. We provide vision screenings, dental screenings, hearing screenings, and nutrition screenings.
whatTheyOffer: We're here to help child care providers and families in San Francisco neighborhoods with health, safety advice, checkups, training, and getting ready for emergencies. We provide vision screenings, dental screenings, hearing screenings, and nutrition screenings.
howToGetIt: For more information, forms and policies please review ONLINE
